Social Media Advertising

Attract more customers than ever with targeted social media marketing

Social media marketing and advertising offer a cost-effective way to attract more customers to your business. Since more than 95% of Australian millennials are on mobile devices and social media usage keeps climbing each year, incorporating social media ads into your marketing strategy has become more essential than ever.

Our expert team leverages Facebook and Instagram ads to tap into their vast daily user base. We can target new customers for higher conversions and boost engagement for your business.

Frequently Asked Questions

Facebook:

Facebook ads are targeted, clickable advertisements designed to blend seamlessly with organic posts or stories. These pay-per-click (PPC) ads charge you each time someone clicks on them. To create a Facebook ad, you need to have a Facebook page. The platform offers a wide range of targeting options, including location, demographics, interests, and behaviors. You can choose to display your ads as posts, stories, in Messenger, or through Facebook's Audience Network, which includes its partner sites.

Instagram:

Instagram ads function similarly to Facebook ads and require both a Facebook page and an Instagram business profile. These ads also operate on a PPC basis, with the same targeting options available as on Facebook. Instagram offers five types of ads:

  1. Photo Ads
  2. Video Ads
  3. Carousel Ads
  4. Slideshow Ads
  5. Stories Ads

The short answer is YES.

Social media advertising is a quick and cost-effective way to increase traffic. It offers immediate results and allows for precise targeting of potential customers who are more likely to convert. It's also an excellent strategy for building brand awareness and enhancing credibility. For the most effective approach, we suggest combining it with our search engine optimization services.

A social media marketing company develops a digital strategy tailored to platforms like Facebook and Instagram. Their experts identify and target your ideal audience, helping to grow your business by increasing leads and sales. Partnering with a social media marketing company allows you to focus on your business while they handle all aspects of your social media presence.
